titles.title: SF642 When I'm feeling down and sad,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I'm feeling down and sad,
nothing much to make me glad,
help me to remember,
you are there for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When things seem so different, and
very hard to understand,
help me to remember,
you are close to me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When no-one has time for me,
nothing's like it used to be,
help me to remember,
you are still with me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When I'm crying, deep inside,
harder than I've ever cried,
help me to remember,
you are loving me.
